TEXT.TITLE: JAMESWAY <JMY> SETS SPLIT, HIGHER CASH PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Jamesway Corp said its board declared a two for one stock split and increased the quarterly cash dividend by 33 pct. The company said the dividend on the pre-split shares was increased to four cts from three cts. It said both the split and the dividend are payable May 23 to holders of record April 20, adding the company will have about 13,860,000 shares outstanding after the split. Reuter
